yeah

network resources, anything
I just like the consolidation of all the icons into the dock - status notifications and all right there. Of course, system tools are slowly leaking upward into the menubar
but apple has promised to break that every major OS release, if you read between the lines
'don't do this with non-system code'
mmm.. cookies
wrong order
hoary, then hell, then sarge ;-)
I really like it because it doesn't prompt at all
it's really a scratch space area
no "Are you sure you want to create a shortcut"
prompts are overused. I like the UI design philosophy of 'assume the user isn't a moron, so only prompt them if something they are trying to do is genuinely destructive, like deleting a folder'
